name: Platform Europe Peru
memberOrga: Peru Support Group – Great Britain; Entraide et Fraternité –  Belgium; Commission Justice & Paix Belgique Francophone – Belgium; Asociación Pro Derechos Humanos de España – Spain; Centro de Investigación y Documentación Chile-América Latina – Germany; Secours Catholique –  France;  Informationsstelle Peru – Germany; CATAPA – Belgium; Broederlijk Delen – Belgium; Kampagne “Bergwerk Peru – Reichtum geht, Armut bleibt“  – Germany; Coalition of the Flemish North-South Movement, 11.11.11 – Belgium; PLataforma Q’atary Peru – Spain; Peru Kommittén för MR – Sweden; Entrepueblos – Spain; FOS – Belgium;  Asociación Putumayo – Belgium.. Amnesty International (Belgium) is associated to the PEP as observer.
goal: The Platform Europe Peru (Plataforma Europa Perú – PEP) is a network of 16 European NGOs that was created in 2005 with the aim to increase coordination of advocacy toward European institutions and the European public on the topic of human rights situation in Peru.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: Following of the TLC between UE and Peru/Colombia/Ecuador.
